product_name: Big Agnes Three Island UL 2 Tent
long_description: Efficient and ultralight, this 3-season, 2-person tent features minimalist single-wall construction on the back half and a large mesh sleeping space for stargazing on clear backcountry nights.
short_description: Efficient and ultralight, this 3-season, 2-person tent features minimalist single-wall construction on the back half and a large mesh sleeping space for stargazing on clear backcountry nights.
